ball.question: Question

all: Ahhh, you're one of those people
And pigs fly- oh wait, I thought we were only talking about things that are possible
Are you okay? Normal people don't ask that
As soon as you get your grades up
As soon as your headass learns how to read
Ask me again I'm not sure
Ask your parents for permission first
Bruh what the fuck- just no
Call your grandma you dumb fuck
Call the police when you realize how dumb you are
Fuck you. I'm done with your shit
I'd rather keep that to myself...
I'd rather you ask yourself first
If only it was that easy...
If you give me ice cream I'll answer
If you think about it, yes
Jesus you're killing me with these questions
My friend, it isn't that easy
Not until you get into college
Of all people, why ask me? (jk keep talking to me)
Of course you're gonna ask me that
Oh wouldn't you just love to know the answer
Only a dick like you would know
That's what the goverment want's you to think... :wink:
What are you asking me for?
What the fuck is that supposed to mean?
Yea totally- no of course not you fucker
Yes! Yes! Why won't you take yes for an answer?

donate.title: Magic8 Donation Page
description: Donating to developers are motives for them to keep their projects going and let them know people care about their work.

**Magic8** will for sure be around for a long time, but all the work put in to Magic8 depends on how much the users use it. Donating allows developers to know there are still people who want this project to be under development
Join our server **[Magic8 Support Server]({INVITATION})** for more details about how to obtain `Supporter üí∏` role.

invite.title: Invite Magic8 to your server!
description: Hey {AUTHOR}! Do you like **Magic8**?`,`Do you want your friends to know about **Magic8** too?
Invite the bot to your **game server** so all your friends can enjoy **Magic8's** unique features together!

level.title: {BOTNAME} - Server Level
description: **Servers Levels** are made to adjust to members necessity based on **guild size**!
The **more members** you have, the **more custom responses** you can use!
This server can set up to **{MAXRESPONSES}** custom responses.
